s: NIKKO CERAMICS INC NIKKO: Excellent Quality Dinnerware and Tableware Since 1908

August 14, 2024 - Nikko was founded in 1908 in Kanazawa, Ishikawa by Lord Maeda and local nobles. The Maeda lords especially fostered arts and crafts, and made of Kanazawa a cultural center like Tokyo and Kyoto. The firm was famous for their ironstone ceramics, but Nikko has broadened its output since the 1970s.

Making the future wonderful through our four brand segments. Together with the “Ceramics and Lifestyle” division, which has continued since our establishment, we support comfortable living through our “Water Creation/Environment,” “Bath Life,” and “Functional Ceramics” brands.

Nikko Fine Bone China is characterized by its elegant pure white color, which is the result of our unique ceramics technology that has enabled us to raise the content of bone ash to approximately 50%. The most important feature of Nikko Fine Bone China is its elegant pure white color.
Nikko Ceramics is a renowned brand, renowned for its exquisite craftsmanship and timeless designs. Its centerpiece item is a range of beautiful, handcrafted ceramic pieces, perfect for any home.
Check out our nikko ceramics selection for the very best in unique or custom, handmade pieces from our shops.
